text: 4th OTO Awards \---- Reduta, Bratislava, Slovakia \---- Overall winner Zdena Studenková \---- Hall of Fame Eva Krížiková \---- EuroTelevízia Award IQ Test národa \---- ◄ 3rd | 5th ► The 4th OTO Awards, honoring the best in Slovak popular culture for the year 2003, took time and place on January 31, 2004, at the Reduta concert hall in Bratislava. Unlike the previous editions of the show, the ceremony broadcast live JOJ. The host of the show, for a change, was actor Maroš Kramár. ==Performers== * Lenka Filipová, musician * Jana Kirschner, singer * Ján Kuric and Vidiek, band * Martin Maxa, singer * Misha, singer * No Name, band * R.A.D.O., singer ==Winners and nominees== ===Main categories=== ; Television {| class=wikitable style="background:white" !
